alert.note: Alert for Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 3:00PM EST until December 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch to two inches is expected, especially across higher elevations of the Tug Hill and south of the Mohawk Valley. Low lying valley locations should see up to a half inch of accumulation. Wind gusts up to 35mph will be possible into the evening hours. * WHERE...Northern Oneida, Onondaga, Madison and Southern Oneida counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida
